summary: Dame Julie Elizabeth Andrews  is a British movie and stage actress, singer, theatre director, dancer, and writer.
full_text: Hawaii is a 1966 American film directed by George Roy Hill and based on the novel of the same name by James A. Michener. It tells the story of an 1820s Yale University divinity student  who, accompanied by his new bride , becomes a Calvinist missionary in the Hawaiian Islands. It was filmed at Old Sturbridge Village, in Sturbridge, Massachusetts, and on the island of Oahu in Hawaii.
title: Hawaii (1966 movie)
